definition: supplementary cash reserve/private fund/private hoard/slush fund
small/tiny/few/young
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
warehouse/storehouse/(file) library

sentences.english: Some even suspect that the modern welfare, is the civil affairs department coffers.
sentences.chinese: 有人甚至懷疑現代福利院，是民政部門的小金庫。

sentences.english: It's a habit you might want to consider in order to build up your own little storehouse of cash.
sentences.chinese: 你可以借鑑這個習慣，建立一個自己的小金庫。

sentences.english: A light purse is a heavy curse .
sentences.chinese: 小金庫好比一個巨大的詛咒。

sentences.english: Some even suspect that the modern welfare is the civil affairs department coffers.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有人懷疑，現代福利，是民政部門的小金庫。

sentences.english: The "departmental coffer" is a hotbed of corruption.
sentences.chinese: “小金庫”是當前滋生腐敗現象的溫牀。

sentences.english: The"small coffer", which has disturbed seriously the order of the financial activities, is very dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 小金庫”嚴重擾亂了財務活動秩序，危害極大。

sentences.english: Cases involving off-books accounts and arbitrary spending in violation of regulations will be investigated and dealt with severely.
sentences.chinese: 嚴厲查處設立小金庫和各種違反規定亂花錢的行爲。

definition: vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
(to act) on one's own initiative
a register/land register/account book/ledger
visitation rights (law)
lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
to plot and kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
it will cause no end of trouble (idiom)
the trick of injuring oneself to gain the enemy's confidence/CL:條|条[tiao2]
animals
to play deaf-mute
fight to the death/desperate struggle
delaying tactics/stalling/measures to stave off an attack/stratagem to win a respite
proficiency in a particular field (idiom)/skill in a specialized area (idiom)
